name: Switchgrass, at conversion plant, 2022
description: This process transports switchgrass to the conversion plant. It does so using transportation modal allocation from the USDA Ethanol Backgrounder (2007), assuming these current corn grain allocations are applicable to switchgrass and to year 2022. Distances for each mode are from a combination of references; still missing a good distance estimate for barge, but since the share of barge transportation is ~2%, the final result will not be sensititive to this parameter. Infrastructure impacts are included in this process by calling the Ecoinvent "transport" processes. ALSO NEED TO CREATE PARAMETERS SPECIFIC TO SWITCHGRASS INSTEAD OF USING STOVER ONES (where differences to stover can be documented).
category: 48-49: Transportation and Warehousing/4842: Specialized Freight Trucking

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.

flow.name: Switchgrass, at conversion plant
flow.category: Technosphere Flows/48-49: Transportation and Warehousing/4842: Specialized Freight Trucking

exchanges.description: This is the most stringest European emission standard for lorries, though presumably considerably higher than standards in place in 2022.  Assumes backhauling of gasoline (i.e., no attributable empty return trip). Proxy: Transport, lorry >32t, EURO5/RER with US electricity U.

exchanges.description: assuming barge is for dry goods, barge tanker for liquid. This process relates to "average" (current) barges, even though emissions will presumably be considerably lower in 2022. Assumes backhauling of gasoline (i.e., no attributable empty return trip). Proxy: Transport, barge/RER with US electricity U.

exchanges.description: This process uses European train data extrapolated to US by ecoinvent. This process relates to "average" (current) trains, even though emissions will presumably be considerably lower in 2022. Assumes backhauling of gasoline (i.e., no attributable empty return trip). Proxy: Transport, freight, rail, diesel/US with US electricity U.
